channel.description: Week 8 Announcements Next Week Mon 10/20: Lab 4 Quizzes Tue 10/21: Discuss 3 Fri 10/24: Lab 4 Tue 10/28: Discuss 2 Lab 4 Windows Server VM Active Directory OpenLDAP Configure Clients Configure Interop MAKE SNAPSHOTS Lab 4 Setup Lab 3 DNS & DHCP Server Lab 3 Static DNS Hosts File Entries Lab 4 Grading Windows Server Windows AD User/Group Windows -> AD OpenLDAP User/Group Ubuntu -> LDAP Ubuntu -> AD Speakers: Nick Eggleston & Nathan Wells Beocat Sysadmins Tuesday 10/21 2:30 PM Speaker: Kyle Hutson Lambda Labs https://lambdalabs.com/ Formerly KANREN Formerly Beocat Tuesday 10/28 2:30 PM Keep in Touch!
